trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_SEQ_00<tab>A few extra supplies never hurt anyone. Especially not Kageel Ja.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kubeel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> north of the dirigible landing)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kubeel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Yak Awak Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kubeel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Yak Awak Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kubeel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>Fieldwork takes its toll on all of us─our tools included. Daily upkeep is as vital to a tool as good soil is to our crops.
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>That said, repair supplies are in high demand around the gainery, and we could use a hand replenishing our stock.

TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>We're currently in need of aqueous tsolystones─you'll find them north of the dirigible landing. The Xbr'aal often sharpen their scythe blades with those stones, and we'd do well to learn from their example.

TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_004<tab>To prevent their tools from rusting, the Xbr'aal often coat their tools with natural plant oils from the Ut'ohmu Horizon, and we mean to do the same. I'm told you'll be able to gather your fill by Yak Awak Tsoly.

TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>The soft flesh of tsoly sponges is ideal for keeping our tools free of dirt and grime. The Xbr'aal use them regularly as well. As their name implies, you'll find them dwelling among the fresh waters of Yak Awak Tsoly.
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>They're quite fond of golden stonefly nymphs, so I suggest you stock up on them if you haven't already.
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>Once you've gathered enough, make for the fields and find Kubeel Ja, who manages our tool supply. He'll see to it that your provisions are put to good use.

TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KUBEELJA_100_010<tab>Ah, I take it you're the one responsible for procuring the repair supplies? Travel to the upper reaches of the forest is, well... It's no easy journey for us, you understand. Your assistance is much appreciated.
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KUBEELJA_100_011<tab>You must be the one Kageel Ja mentioned. Here to contribute some repair supplies for the tools, yes?
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KUBEELJA_100_012<tab>Hm... This should do nicely. I'll add it to the storehouse as soon as I'm able. Many thanks for the assistance.
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KUBEELJA_200_012<tab>You have a good eye for quality materials, friend. I'll be sure to bring your supplies to the storehouse as soon as I'm able.
TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_013<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hear you made quick work of procuring the extra repair supplies.

TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_014<tab>You have my thanks. Every tool inevitably takes on wear and tear with time─even more so with daily use. Proper maintenance and care is essential if we're to keep them in tip-top condition.

TEXT_BANMAM106_05266_KAGEELJA_000_015<tab>The same can be said for the folks who use the tools as well. So when your body needs a break, you'd best listen to it, you hear? We've plenty more to ask of you, after all, and we'd prefer you stay well rested for the tasks ahead!
